questions.question_text:
A multinational company plans to implement centralized procurement using purchase requisition workflows.
Multiple workflows must be of the same type. Each region must use its own purchase requisition workflow.
You need to implement the workflows.
What should you do?

choices.E: Add a condition for running the workflow

discussion.content:
The "purchase requisition review" workflow is "organization-wide" and not "per company" association (as purchase order WF) so in order to have more than one WF, you need to set the "activation" condition for running different workflow base on the legal entity.
E is the right answer.

questions.question_text:
You manage Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management for a company.
A user is unable to perform a critical business process. The user's permissions must be updated.
You need to identify and resolve the user's missing permissions.
Which feature should you use?

choices.C: Upload files to Dynamics 365 Translation Services (DTS) for conversion
choices.D: Apply return from Dynamics 365 Translation Services (DTS) to the system by submitting a support ticket
choices.B: In User options, set the language preference to Portuguese pt-BR and enter addresses for customers and vendors
choices.A: Under Organization administration, on the Global addresses tab, enter the appropriate translation value in the translations form

questions.question_text:
A company implements Dynamics 365 Finance.
You have a requirement that the component data for address structure in the system be available in Portuguese (Brazil).
You need to provide address and contact information in Portuguese.
What should you do?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
A and B are applicable so this is a trick question both are correct!!!
